message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.SY, cs.RO 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the development of cognition in virtual animats through synthetic experimentations, which involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) techniques. The animats adapt their koncepts through plasticity, which is a characteristic of neural networks (cs.NE). The association of koncepts with actions suggests the involvement of control systems (cs.SY) and robotics (cs.RO).
